messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone hasss authority to punch anyone in the dick if they can mathmaticly proove there a cunt

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Getting some weird bio hazard readings from genetics, can someone check that out?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Has anyone checked out those bio hazard readings? Can someone please report back?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please report in about the bio hazard or we will need to send an inspector.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: This is the final request for a report before we send an inspector.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Alright we are preparing an inspector now, you all better be alive by the time the inspector gets there since you were expensive.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our centcomm inspector has arrived, please give him a warm welcome.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
